description:
As a change of pace, in October we'll be hosting a night of 5-10 minute lightning talks at BaseKit!

- Carbon, a simple API extension for DateTime
  Gavin Davies, Software Developer at Radify and author of Deal With It: Attitude for Coders

- Kahlan, a BDD Framework a la RSpec/JSpec using a Jasmine style notation
  Warren Seymour, Software Developer at Radify

- PHP static site generation
  Kiel Doyle, PHP Developer at ASDAN

- Terraform
  Andy Gale, Web Consultant at Hello Future

- Thumbor
  Tom Holder, Technical Director at Simpleweb

- Vagrant
  Doug Fitzmaurice, Developer at Ents24

- Varnish & ESI
  Ade Slade, PHP Developer at BaseKit

- Versioning
  Dave Liddament, PHP, Java & Python Software Developer

- Working with legacy code
  Gareth Jones, Software Developer at Brightpearl

--

BaseKit have kindly offered to host the evening at their office, and as always there'll be beer and pizza. Don't forget to check them out- and if you're looking, they are hiring.

Afterwards we'll head to the pub, The Apple if it's sunny, Horts if it's not!

Also, do check out our new website, as well as our new sponsors; Ents24, Just Eat and Redrock without whom our events would not be possible.
title: Lightning talks
